originalText.text: I felt compelled to write a review based upon my experiences with the owner and the care that he and his staff takes in ensuring that patients are handled with the utmost of care and respect. I have witnessed the compassion  and integrity this company has in delivering highly skilled services tailored to the needs of the patient. It is a quality I haven‚Äôt really found in other agencies until I met this company. They treat you as if you are a member of their family which is so invaluable, especially when you find yourself in a position to need help and can be surrounded by agencies that only see you as dollar signs instead of a human in a vulnerable state. Thank you for making patients feel safe and truly cared for. Many blessings to you.

originalText.text: Highly recommending MMO nursing, the owner of the company and the entire staff are great professionals, and most importantly, their main goal is to provide patient-oriented care. I can say with certainty that your loved ones will be in the safe hands of dedicated professionals providing high-quality care 24/7. Thank you for making life easier for a vulnerable population and their families.

originalText.text: Micah was my brothers nurse for many many years. The care that he gave my brother goes well beyond and patient and nurse. Mike treated not only brother but myself like family. Anyone that is looking for genuine care this is definitely where you should be. I highly recommend This agency and anyone that Micah employees. He restored my faith in humanity and I will be forever grateful.

originalText.text: I would highly recommend  Micha and his team for anyone looking for a nursing service. I have personally seen him work. He is very professional, knowledgeable and compassionate. He provides the best care for his patients and has excellent bedside manners.
